devices_included: Public display; Whiteboard, large vertical display
contribution_desc: HeatSpace, a system that analyses user behaviour in a space over time and propose display placements based on this data. Generates volumetric heat maps. Automatically optimises the position and size of display surfaces based on user behaviour.
tracking_characteristic: Orientation; Tracking users only; Outside-in tracking
crossdevice_def:
"Multi-display environments (MDEs) are used in various scenarios, ranging from individual multi-display work, via collaborative work, to command-and-control rooms."

"Multi-display systems are used for a variety of scenarios, from single-user to multi-user collaboration. These systems often consist of a set of private and public displays with different sizes and arrangements"
